overview.desc_text:
Capture stunning aerial images with this Protocol Slipstream drone camera. It delivers live streaming video on your smartphone via Wi-Fi, and it has selectable speeds, auto stabilizers and multidirectional maneuvering to provide versatile, precise shooting of captivating scenes. This Protocol Slipstream drone camera is made from crash-resistant materials to ensure long-lasting use.
Fly Responsibly:
Before takeoff, update all software and firmware, and read the instructions thoroughly.
See the FAA website for registration requirements and information about flying a drone safely: https://www.faa.gov/uas/getting_started/. Additional state or local requirements may apply. Check your local jurisdiction. The following websites may help you make informed decisions about flying your drone: www.knowbeforeyoufly.org and www.modelaircraft.org.

features.text: Take action shots to show your friends in 720 x 576 resolution.
Lets you perform a variety of precision aerial tricks.
Durable materials protect your drone against damage.

Included.row_value: Battery, remote controller, replacement blades, smartphone mount, USB cable charger, instruction manual

comment_body.review_text: Its small and compact and easy to fly.  Battery last about 10 minutes.
Good lil play drone smaller then I was thinkn but fun for the fly time and practice, ill probly give it to the gbaby let him get use to the sky before the big boys start up
Nice little unit for indoor flying. I tried it outside and it just got swept away by a very light wind. Bumpers on sides work great to protect walls inside.  Battery life is very short. Basically fun

The only reason for 4⭐️ Is because I had to exchange out the item twice cause of no video feed, but other than that you can expect to have a few flaws for the price you pay, overall store quality/ geek squad/ store reps served me A ONE , would still highly recommend
Makes sure you let it fully charge before use. My son loves it nevertheless being that it his first drone
Not easy to use bought for a 12 year old and he had a really hard time with the controller.

It only lasts for about 5 minutes before you have to recharge it again. It says it in the instructions but with Best Buy’s return policy of having to pay a restocking fees if it’s open that doesn’t leave you with much room to just take it back without having a loss any way.  Kiddo still likes it but gets annoyed that he can’t play with it for long. For 80 bucks the battery should last at least 15 minutes right? Yeesh
Great little toy drone. Would recommend getting extra batteries, but it's a blast. Wish it had an HD camera, but you get what you pay for.

comment_body.sub_heading: Taking back because fly time is less than 5 minute
comment_body.review_text: Probably good for beginners, but with fly time less than 5 minutes I will return item.

The battery life is dismal.  I would think a better battery would be provided.  

Disappointed but it is fun to use.
This drone worked well until it broke.  It is fragile so you will want to make sure you take good care of it or it could break.
Got this as a gift for my grandchildren and I can’t wait till they see it. I really believe they will enjoy it. I should get one for myself soon.
I would recommend for first time use. I brought it for my son for Christmas and I know he will love it!

I purchased this drone for my son for his 10th birthday. He adapted quickly to the controls. A slight breeze will require a speed adjustment but he figured that out on his own so I believe any other beginner could figure it out to.
first time using a drone and it was easy to learn for the whole family ! Strongly recommended for new users

I bought this for my son-in-law who is a golf pro at a country club.  He said he's put it to use many times.  Leak on the roof?  No longer need a ladder to check it out.  It let's him "get to places" that are otherwise unaccessible.
